mapper.select:
select count(*) from tb_automobile_order o left join tb_automobile_order_detail d on o.id=d.t_id where 1=1 and d.state=0
and o.state=#{state}
mapper.update: update tb_automobile_order o set o.state=#{state}, o.updateTime=#{updateTime} where o.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_automobile_order(userName, userTel, departurePlace, destination, checkStartTime, checkEndTime, peopleNum, createTime, updateTime, state) values(#{userName}, #{userTel}, #{departurePlace}, #{destination}, #{checkStartTime}, #{checkEndTime}, #{peopleNum}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, 0)
